name: Pumpkin Lord and his golden candy
name_original: Pumpkin Lord and his golden candy
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT (A LOT OF UNCOMPLETED FEATURES) You need to steal the golden candy from the pumpkin lord as revenge. And you use guns to do it!

I hope to finish by the 31st of October. I will still work on it after if it is incomplete.

I also at the end plan to add a web version.

1. Q = Dropping the current gun

2. If you die you have to close and reopen the application (Will add a death screen soon)

here is a link to a youtube playlist if you want to see how the game has changed:

https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLveI_3x35vPiwROdEygahqWpaFjeYcTW3
